# cytofData

```{r}
library(cytofData)
```

This package contains preprocessed CyTOF data sets. 

Data sets can be loaded by name

```{r}
bodenmiller2012bcrxl()
```

or via ExperimentHub

```{r}
eh <- ExperimentHub()
query(eh, "bodenmiller")
eh[["bodenmiller2012bcrxl"]]
```

The procedure to generate the provided data files is detailed in `inst/scripts/make-data.R`.
